testcase.name: Within the Salesforce application User is able to create New Account

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given User will Open Salesforce Website.....................................undefined When verify title for the Salesforce page...................................undefined Then user will enter "vedant.jagani@campingworld.com.test" and "Welcome2019*".undefined And user click the login button............................................undefined And verify title for the Salesforce Home page...............................undefined Then user will click on the waffle icon.....................................undefined Then user will navigate to the Search field and search for the Account......undefined Then user weill verify title for the Account page...........................undefined Then user will click on the New button......................................undefined Then user will select the Household radio button............................undefined Then user will click the Next button within the New Account window..........undefined Then user will verify that the required fields message is displayed.........undefined Then user will populate fields within the Account Information section "Automation1" and "1234567890" and "101".undefined Then user will populate fields within the Address Inforamtion section "101 Chicago St" and "102 Chicago St" and "Chicago" and "S Chicago" and "<billingzipcode>" and "60169".undefined Then user will populate fields within the Cloud MDM Information.............undefined And Click on the Save button................................................undefined
